name: Leaping Anyway
description:
You find yourself in a strange, scary place. The walls themselves seem to be watching you, observing every step you take. And something sinister seems to await at the end of this corridor ...

This game was created within 72 hours for the "Courage"-themed Mini Jam 77. Unfortunately, it lacks a lot of polish, but at least I got it submitted in time :)

Controls:
- Arrow keys to move.
- R to restart the current room.
